text: His friend pushed him into the lake. They were on the annual camping trip. They were at their favorite spot on the shore and his friend told him to get a frog. He said no because he had just sat down to eat his sandwich. She didn't take no for an answer and pushed him in. When he emerged, she had scooped up the frog. He laughed uncontrollably. He said he would get revenge.

My best friend pushed me into a lake. We were on a camping trip. It was a relaxed afternoon. We were at our favourite spot. She asked me to catch a frog. I said no. She didn't take no for an answer and pushed me in. The frog jumped onto land and she picked it up and handed it to me. I laughed uncontrollably and swore to get my revenge.

Two friends were on a summer camping trip when one got pushed into the lake by the other. The reason this happened is that as they were eating their sandwiches by the lake they spotted a frog. One friend dared the other friend to pick it up but she refused and the other friend pushed her in. As the friend emerged from the lake, she spotted the frog and burst out laughing. Her friend scooped up the frog and put it back in the lake. The soggy friend told the other girl that she would get her revenge on her soon!

I was on my annual camping trip with my friend, in our regular favorite spot. I was just sitting down eating my sandwich when my friend spotted a frog by the lake's edge. She dared me to catch it and I said no. But of course, with best friends, sometimes they don't take no for an answer. I was by the water edge when she snuck up behind me and pushed me in. She then picked up the frog and handed it to me and I laughed uncontrollably. Then I said to her "look out you'll get yours eventually."
I and my friend went out, and then we saw a frog, then she gave me a nudge, you know friends cannot get no for an answer, I said to myself I will give her a payback.

I was visiting a lake with my friend. It was our annual summer camping trip. We were sat down on the shore of the lake. Our favourite spot to hang out and relax. When she saw a frog at the lake's edge. "Go catch it" she said. "Not a chance" I replied. As I stood up to move away she gave me a nudge into the water. As I emerged I let out an uncontrollable laugh. She grabbed the frog and handed it to me. "I'll get my revenge" I said.

My friend pushed me into the lake. Here's the story. It was our annual camping trip and we were sitting at our favourite spot by the lake and my friend dared me to pick up the frog which was by the waterside and I said no. We were eating our sandwiches at the time. I thought it was gross. But as friends commonly do, they don't take no for an answer and she nudged me into the water. When I got out of the water my friend picked up the frog and handed it to me. It wasn't as bad as I had expected. But I wanted revenge for her pushing me into the lake and I vowed to make her pay some day.

Best friend pushed me into a lake on their annual summer camping trip one afternoon. Reason was because of a frog at the waters edge in a favourite spot in the woods. She was dared to catch it but had just started eating a sandwich so didn't want to. So the friend sneaked up and pushed her in. When she came back up the frog was on the shore which the friend scooped up and gave to her. So she laughed and said that she will get her revenge.

My best friend played a trick on me. We were camping, it was summer. We were by the lake. I was eating a sandwich. There was a frog. She dared me to catch the frog. I said no but she pushed me into the water. We laughed. I said I would get her back.
